UPDATE.LOG:
net-mgmt/netbox: Update to 2.10.10
Changelog:
Enhancements: * Add DC terminal power port, outlet types * Add Saf-D-Grid power port, outlet types * Support Markdown rendering for report logs * Add F connector port type * Add SFP56 50GE interface type
Bug Fixes: * Update parent device/VM when deleting a primary IP * Fix VLAN assignment when editing VM interfaces in bulk * Update object data when renaming a custom field * Optimize change log cleanup * Fix MAC address field display in VM interfaces search form * Fix custom field filtering for cables, virtual chassis * Fix choice field filters (multiple models)
https://github.com/netbox-community/netbox/releases/tag/v2.10.10
MFH: 2021Q2 (cherry picked from commit f2a9b3469d37649d527bb47cca797670370ee2d4)
